pages.title: ⍟ Seven of Pentacles ⍟
pages.text: Spirit of Success Unfulfilled$(br)      ♄ Saturn in ♉ Taurus

A young person, leaning on their staff, looks intently at seven pentacles attached to a clump of greenery on their right; one would say that these fruits were treasures and that their heart was in them.$(br)  They have worked long and patiently to nurture tiny seeds into this thriving garden and now take a break to enjoy the fruiting of their labor.$(br)  Success is a journey, not a destination, but it is often a tedious and exhausting one.$(br)  At the end of the day, the

work is what counts, and even more, what the work produces. $(br2)$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Production, fulfillment, though it may be flawed.$(br)  Immersing yourself in your work. Patience, ingenuity and diligence.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Holding back from committing to something.$(br)  Hard work, without fruition or satisfaction.
